website_summaries.verdict: While it offers some nice features, it's not the most comfortable or practical model on the market.
pros: A basic mattress that fits most futon frames
Microfiber cover is easy to remove and clean
cons: middle tends to sink after moderate use
Doesn't fold easily when used on a futon frame

customer_reviews.title: Full product description
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows that it is an entire set and the descriptions do not state it is mattress only. I thought I was getting the whole thing for the price I paid. Had I known differently I would have purchased something else
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not really what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Just put this on the futon frame, at the moment I'm not thrilled with it but will see how it holds up. It's nothing but a covered formed fabric slab, no other padding and no foam. Plus the supposed "tufts" are nothing but plastic tabs which will not be at all comfortable to sleep on if one is in the wrong place besides being fairly easy to break. It says the covering is microfiber but it feels very much like nylon, slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon W.

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Have had 3 weeks- extremely disappointed compared to the $50 futon I bought off craigslist but couldn’t bring when I moved. That one was way more dense and balanced. Idk really but definitely more comfortable. This pancake did not expand to a full 6 in. But more importantly, you can feel the coils and it is uneven. I had to buy a mattress topper. But honestly at this point I have decided to just buy another mattress to go on top of it bc it still sucks.
customer_reviews.author: downbythesea

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress based on two qualifications, it was priced below $150 and it was listed as one of Amazon's top sellers. I really didn't have high hopes for this mattress but it just needed to do the job for a few months until we moved into our house. I must say I am quite impressed with the quality and it is comfortable to sit on. I got the 6 inch mattress simply because I felt the 8 inch was going to be too thick and I am very happy with my choice. The 8 inch would have rendered the armrests unusable. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Haven't opened the box yet, but after waiting 2 weeks to get here I find out it is not a futon, but a futon mattress... The product headline was "DHP 6" Futon and 6" Memory Foam Mattress, Black" Guess I did not think that a 6 inch futon would not be anything... It must be a nice mattress for the price, but live and learn... "Live and Learn" would mean in their terms that I am dead... Not too upset, now have to find a place to buy a futon without a mattress... NOT AT AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: FRED FINCH

customer_reviews.title: Smelly!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct! This mattress smells like mildew and smelled up my house. I aired it out for a couple of weeks and even bought and used "odor elminating" products - didn't work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Field

customer_reviews.title: Needed more comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The futon is nice and well made. But, I'm old and heavy and needed more comfort. I could feel the spring from the 6 inch thick mattress. I didn't want to return it. I also wanted another futon cover so I ordered a 6-8 inch cover and a 2 inch Memory Foam. I lined up both mattresses and the cover and zipped it up. Oh Wow! I'm in love with this Futon. It is now so comfortable and the new cover fits snug. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Mom is hard to please and she LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My 86 year old Mom has a futon where she watches TV and often when it gets late, she dozes off right on the futon. Her old mattress needed replacing so I went with this one. She was VERY unsure at first, but turns out she loves it and can't stop talking about it. I think she may forgo her bed for this futon now!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Zipper failed after 3 times.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very comfortable and solid, however the zipper is very cheaply made and failed after only three removals for washing, despite being very careful with it. It also has several small hooks on the mattress itself which are intended to be re-attached after washing. These hooks however cannot be grabbed and manipulated through the cover once back on, making it impossible to put the cover back on properly. The mattress is great, but you might want to look for another cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!! Both my dog and myself love the matress. I can fall asleep and stay asleep all night. And I no longer wake with back pain like I did with my mattress. I installed this in my studio instead of just having a matress. It allows me much more room and was well worth the price. I am super satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this to anyone looking for a futon mattress. It is a bit hard to fold but it may be because of the springs in the mattress. Still even with this being the case I would purchase this all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darned comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on a futon frame as my living room couch. it is pretty darned comfy, for both sitting and snoozing. Time will tell if the coils hold up, though I will be turning it every few months to spread the stress. As other reviews/answers have mentioned, it is easy to fold along any given row of coils. BTW, the mattress did not have any odd manufacturing/material odors. Also, you do need to give it at least a few hours to fully expand before using it...
customer_reviews.author: Va Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tan mattress and alone it looks very nice but for company, I bought white sheets and a mattress protector. The mattress' comfort level is ☆☆☆☆ It's a new mattress so I don't know how well it will hold-up but I will update if it starts going downhill within 2 years of Sept 2020. Especially since it's in my spare room and not used daily; this fact alone should help it last longer. As of today (10/06/20), I highly recommend this futon mattress
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Just dont do it....its not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: You would think this would be better in comfort and quality than the walmart futon concidering it is almost the same price for the whole thin vs just the mattress. Its not...had it a month and you can feel every bar from my frame, bought separately, because the fluff has separated. When I bought it it said it had springs in the description. I expected it to, id did not have any. Soon after the name was changed. Just buy the cheap one at walmart or just spend the extra cash and get a better mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a good matress over all.. I like these type of matress better because they are not so thick so they dont deform/sink (my hubby is quite a big guy so his side always sinks). This is the first one i buy online. Is good but i had one at big lots (more than double the price) and it was better. More resistant or heavy duty persay and outside cover was better quality too.. I tought this would be same.. It wasnt but is still good overall.. It holds him which is what mattered..
customer_reviews.author: iovana g.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a little over a year on a platform frame. The top has quilted hard toggles which dig into my back/side and springs which can also dig in. Definitely a firmer feel. Slides around, but not as bad as others I have used before. I can't imagine it folding into a seated position easily? I keep it flat. Looks nice but hasn't held up to daily use and is sagging on the corners already. I weight 150lbs (nothing dramatic). I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: average buyer

customer_reviews.title: I prefer it to more traditional pad-style futon mattresses...
customer_reviews.text: This futon has more resilience than other types... it has a cushion-style give to it, rather than just a thick cloth-pad mat. The cover is easy to keep clean... thx.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a giant piece of cardboard covered on one side ...
customer_reviews.text: Just awful. Feels like a giant piece of cardboard covered on one side with padding and the other side just covered with the black cloth. It's not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Meador

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to convert from bed to couch
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Came rolled in plastic in a box, and popped out once removed. There is definitely a smell to it and a slight film on it, which has yet to go away after a week of having it, but no noticeable mold or bugs. Feels firm and comfortable to sleep on, but creaks. Unfortunately, it’s nearly impossible to make this futon mattress remain in a seated position. (I tried weighing it down with heavy objects and leaving it for a few hours, but it immediately popped flat again after taking a few of those objects off.) Would rate higher, if it weren’t for its smell and its inability to remain in a seating position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the bed is comfortable for my partner but i didn't like it so ...
customer_reviews.text: the bed is comfortable for my partner but i didn't like it so much .. not sure how to describe it but its a bit hard for my back, i mean its a mattress so it has to be soft not to soft but idk i personally didn't like it.. not to say it is very warm, my room is warm already and this mattress with the blankets makes the room even more hot.. its like sleeping on a blanket with blankets on top, not because the mattress soft like a blanket but the mattress covered with a blanket somewhat material... very warm..
customer_reviews.author: Kemish Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Finally a decent mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Mainstays futon came with crappy mattress so I bought this one as a replacement. It cost more than the original Futon, but I guess you get what you pay for. This one is wonderful. I wish it was the same coloring on both sides so I could reverse it when it starts getting older, but I love being able to sit on the couch and not feel the metal bars underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa I

customer_reviews.title: Has flattened out and and feel the coils inside...
customer_reviews.text: Starting to flatten out and starting to see and feel the coils inside after 3 weeks of use. Don't bother me much but I will get a nice thick cover for it. I like it, just got the spin it around soon to even it out. Been sleeping and sitting on the one side and I'm heavy. I consider it normal breaking in and will happen to any owner just faster if heavy or daily user... An update: it has become very painful. I can feel the coils even through comforter! No longer like it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Tough and Comfortable, A Great Combination!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress to go on the bottom full-sized bunk on my Grandson's bunk-beds. It doubles as a full bed and a daybed mattress. This mattress is perfect! It has been on the bed for several months now and shows no signs of wear. If you have kids in your house, you know how rough young boys can be on furniture! I am very pleased with this mattress. It is very nice looking and is very comfortable! You can't go wrong with this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: shaesdad

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it has actual coil springs like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it has actual coil springs like a regular bed mattress. It is "firmly soft", if I may put it that way. VERY COMFORTABLE! My sheets fit it, and one of them I use as a cover for it with a color pattern I like and it also serves as a protection against dirt and dust. This is one of the best buys I've made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Old Soldier

customer_reviews.title: Not a people bed.
customer_reviews.text: Coils are a bit intrusive and springy. I suppose it'd be fun for jumping. I sure as heck wouldn't want to sleep on it without a thick foam pillowtop. I'll have to devise a method of securing it in a fold because it just doesn't want to. The dogs are fine with it, and THAT'S who we got it for. $=👍
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Pitt

customer_reviews.title: No better futon mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. Well built and perfectly thick. Sure, if you feel around you can feel where the springs are but it certainly is not annoying. Guests who have slept on it had nothing but good things to say about it. I saw some reviews about a smell. There is no smell other than "fabulously nice new mattress" smell that I could pick up on for about an hour, then it was gone. These are VERY compressed when they get delivered, take care while opening. Takes a good 12-18 hours to fully decompress but is 90% done in the first hour.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is great. I bought this because I wanted a spring ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great. I bought this because I wanted a spring mattress. After owning it for about 1.5 years, it still holds it's shape. (But, I am very light weight, and it is usually just me using it.) I use it with a cheap futon frame. The only problem is that it is so SO heavy. Yes, mattresses are heavy. But I feel like this one is much heavier than other mattresses of similar type I've owned. Also, I wish I could take off the cover for washing. I thought I could because there's a zipper. I ended up buying a separate mattress cover, so not really enjoying the nice microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: HKoni

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is very comfortable especially compared to almost every other futon I've slept on. I'm a heavy person and if I plop down hard, I bottom out, so you may want to look into the 8", but if you're not 250lbs, you should be able to get by with the 6" model.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy,  but good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Quite a find. It was well packed but box was difficult to manage. Finally got it to futon on third floor. Mattress itself was sealed into smaller bag. Opened bag and pop! Mattress expanded. It’s quite comfortable (says the young man sleeping on it)
customer_reviews.author: R. Kittner

customer_reviews.title: Mold infested. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came packaged nicely, and delivered quickly by Amazon. The only problem, is that when I cut the plastic off of the mattress, a blast of mold hit me right in my face. It’s as if the mattress got shrink wrapped while it was wet. I let it air out for a month now and it made the room it’s in smell entirely of mold. It’s not amazons fault at all. The package was delivered on a sunny day and brought inside immediately. The manufacturer needs to get better at packaging and storage. Horrible product. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's my fault I didn't read the description before buying, but THE FIRST PICTURE shows the frame and mattress together which I thought it comes together. When it got delivered, I was pissed off. That's a false advertisement! I didn't have problems with product itself, but it's bs.
customer_reviews.author: yukyu

customer_reviews.title: No smell, folds easily, very comfortable but cannot be flipped
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat hesitant to order this because of the reviews about the smell or the fact that it didn't stay folded. However, no smell at all and folds and stays put without issue. I'm very happy with it after about a week. Very comfortable to sit on and sleep on. However, it cannot be flipped over, as the bottom has a black, cotton-type material and no cushioning. So it has a definitive bottom to it. I wish it could have been flipped like our old one, but I think the black material on the bottom is what helps it stay put on the futon. Overall, this is a great mattress for the price (I shopped around a lot).
customer_reviews.author: B. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the mattress. It looks nice, and sleeps well. I debated about the thickness to order and am glad I went with the 6". I have a futon like the one pictured and a thicker mattress would not fit well. The pieces that hold it from slipping in the front would not be sufficient on a thicker mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Brazier

customer_reviews.title: Smells. Badly.
customer_reviews.text: It has been weeks since I purchased this, and put it in my son's room. And it reeks. It isn't a couple of days as they claimed on the product listing, it has been far longer than they proclaim, and it's just horrible. My son actually comes to lay down with me, and I smell it on him. It's that bad. I had to remove it, and place it in the garage, and the smell still isn't gone. Even febreezing it every other day isn't working.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaXij

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged (it’s heavy!) it’s ok if you’re only going to use it either always in sitting position or always in laying position. It takes days and days to get it to stay in seating position after it’s been laid out flat.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, bought a used futon frame and this new futon mattress u cant even tell the frame is used cause this mattress makes it look brand new, its perfect comfort, sleek look I got the dark gray and it's dark enuff still looking like a gray and not a faded black
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for 9 year old on a fouton. We don’t really open it out into a bed very often so we haven’t had any problems with creasing. One of the button areas has torn a bit after several months of use. This isn’t a big deal for me though because my son is extremely hard on his furniture. I just sewed it back up and it’s fine. I never noticed a smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion but SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fantastic! It's thick, looks great and even had my parents sleep on it and they raved about how great they slept. HOWEVER, it SMELLS. It stunk when I opened it from the plastic and even after 3.5 months, it still reeks. It smells sort of like mildew or a chemical odor. I've tried febreeze, lysol, room scents, spray scents- you name it! Nothing works for more than a few hours. Would I purchase again? Based on the smell (which could potentially be an environmental hazard, especially in a child room) NO. But if you have a constantly cold and can't smell anything? Then I probably would.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons ripped from quilting after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this futon, the top buttons popped off within the first week of use and left holes in the fabric! It is comfortable as a mattress but feels awkward as a couch without lower back support.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Mattress only 😡
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize it don’t come with the futon. It’s just the mattress Not very happy
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to fold because of the stiffness of the mattress, but that is to be expected since I like a firm mattress. To me, that's more comfortable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: WJ McVaugh

customer_reviews.title: Bought for price and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over 6 months now. Works and feels fine if you don't mind a mattress on the stiffer side. Also, I am a light build (about 150lbs), but I can imagine if someone is a little heavier than me the 6-inch thickness will bottom out. It does if I sit on it. Laying on it I'm fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is just great hahah ive probably had it for almost a year
customer_reviews.text: omg. this is just great hahah ive probably had it for almost a year, and i completely love it, i dont feel the springs, i dont feel the crease when i change it from bed to sofa. i usually keep it flat since im sleeping on it, its a little firm, but super comfy. just what my back needed since i have like a temperpedic type of mattress before, my back would just sink into it. since i did polevault in highschool, and had that mattress, it messed up my back. but i feel like this futon mattress is just the fix :)
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Almond

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for a great price. I am using this for the futon in my office/ guest room and it is perfect for my needs. Comfy as both a couch and as a bed when needed. I could not imagine how they got a big full sized mattress in that skinny box but the way it puffs right up when you cut the plastic off was amazing. Other reviews mention a strong odor but mine was very mild and gone in a day or so. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you will not go wrong with this mattress. It did have a strong chemical smell for the first few days until it aired out and now it smells great. Very comfortable and I cannot feel the springs at all. I like the firmness so that you do not sink into like other mattresses do making it hard to get out of. I would recommend this mattress. I found similar mattresses for double what you will pay on Amazon. Very Good Deal for you money. I will definitely buy another for my second futon for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer 8305

customer_reviews.title: FUTON MATRESS UPGRADE
customer_reviews.text: Have metal frame futons but thee mattress always seemed not to last very long and replacement ones were always kinda pricey. I saw this futon on your website and figured after the review's it was taking worth a try the price was right and cheaper than anything I could find in my area . I got it early than promised no problems with instructions for setting it up no smell. Just sitting on it I could feel the difference. Every one who remembers the old mattress has noticed a comfort increase of 100%. Very nice upgrade and if you want more cushion there is also an 8''. Good price great upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth williams

customer_reviews.title: I’m really really disappointed because it is too heavy to ship back and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset. This thing was impossible to get out of the box,I literally had to destroy every inch of the box to get it out! it will not stay in any position on our futon except FLAT as a bed because of the coils. I’m really really disappointed because it is too heavy to ship back and completely unusable!!! ....oh...and it has a hole in the VERY cheap cover too. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney parker

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for over a year and it still looks like new. It is regularly used and has been used as a bed on many occasions and I have received nothing but compliments for its comfort. It naturally bends in half for when it is in the couch position and lays flat in the bed position. It is easy to clean and the best part about it is how it is shipped in a roll for easy transport. I just wish you could put it back in the bag when you go to move it!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! When they deliver it, it's compressed and rolled into the shape of a big sleeping bag. When I first opened it, I saw it was about an inch thick and panicked! But once you open the bag, it "inflates" to regular size, and it's pretty cool to watch. More importantly, the cushion is very comfortable. I've slept on it when I've had friends staying with me, and I have no complaints. The color is a nice neutral color that fits well in my apartment. I would recommend it, especially for the price. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Lu

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to open. I had to cut the box with a knife. Box is glued tight. When i finally got it out, then cut packing plastic and put on frame then cut tape. I wouldnt take it out the plastic tho to monitor for a few months due to the previous review that said other mattress had bed bugs. Bedding sheets fine over it and comfortable otherwise
customer_reviews.author: MelissaKing

customer_reviews.title: Good futon mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy futon mattress, and it was a great deal too. It is way better than the crappy cotton one that came with my futon set that I bought from Walmart years ago. I've been told by guests who have slept on it that it is of comparable quality to a decent mattress, and that's really all I'm looking for in a futon mattress. The shipping and setup process were a breeze. Another great feature of this product is the high-quality microfiber cover that it has, as it seems durable and is very easy to clean. I would highly recommend this over the alternatives for a futon.
customer_reviews.author: ManBearPig

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new futon mattress! I had ordered an 8-inch mattress previously, but it refused to stay in a folded position, so I sent it back and ordered the 6-inch mattress. Took a while to get here, but it is exactly what I wanted, a futon that folds neatly into a couch, is comfortable, and looks great! I will probably add a 2-inch memory foam topper to it to add to the comfort level for overnight guests, but I'm very happy with it as is.
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: First impression is a hit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of those bunk beds where the bottom folds up and requires a futon bed for my 16yo son. I did not like any of the flimsy options that Walmart offered with the bed so I came shopping around. He absolutely loves it. He says it is so comfortable, it still folds well and makes sitting on it and playing his Xbox enjoyable. We have only had it for a few months now so no idea if will stand the test of time yet but so far we are sold. Now its time to get the girls a bunk and I think we get another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't have very high expectations for this product due to the price. I was just expecting a cheap futon mattress to put in my guest room and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product! The springs make it feel more like a mattress than just a pad.. which makes me confident that it won't get matted down and slide off the frame like most futon mattresses do. It seems much more durable and definitely is much more comfortable than the one it replaced!!
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: It smells like a moldy bath towel or an old basement
customer_reviews.text: The smell is absolutely awful. It won’t air out we have had it out of the wrap for two weeks in the living room spraying it with Lysol, then when we moved it to the room it was originally going into, the whole room smells like an old moldy basement.
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but was shipped the wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mattress. It does have springs inside, which make it a little hard to fold up on the futon when the futon is in the couch position. However, it’s super comfortable and a good fit. The only reason I gave it 3 stars rather than 5, is that I ordered a TAN mattress and received a BLACK mattress. I need it for an upcoming event so I do not have time to return it. Otherwise, I like it and will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Jav

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Much cheaper than anytime I could find ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Much cheaper than anytime I could find on Maui. Didn't have any smell like some reviews claimed. It is comfy enough for my boyfriend and I. Had it for a while now and it is still in good condition. Although I don't know that it should be walked on, I feel like I might break a coil or whatever it is inside when I step too heavily. But like I said, it's still in good condition and comfy a year after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Saoirse

customer_reviews.title: I have two futons and ordered this to replace one mattress (dubbed the worst futon ever)
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortabl than anticipated! I have two futons and ordered this to replace one mattress (dubbed the worst futon ever). This is so great! Excellent support, firm but soft, bends easily when you fold up the futon. Would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Vittoria ValentinoSullivan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DHP 6" Futon and 6" Memory Foam Mattress, Black... is the description. Its literally just the mattress. Misleading description DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Gbeezy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Mattress expanded and turned out to be good quality. Pretty comfortable for sitting or laying. Due to thickness, had to close futon rail into couch setting for a while to get it to "crease" and fold up easily. After a few times only took one person to open or close it.
customer_reviews.author: Aneko210

customer_reviews.title: Can't seem to get rid of plastic smell.
customer_reviews.text: Once the Mattress gets it's shape it is very comfortable. It took about 24 hours to take full shape. I've let the mattress air out but can't seem to get rid of the plastic smell...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T

customer_reviews.title: What a scam....
customer_reviews.text: I got my new futon today, or lack thereof. I was fully expecting a full futon and matress. This description is decieving, in that you expect both and it's only a mattress. The price is obscene for a futon mattress that is nothing special. Highly disappointed. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Booth

customer_reviews.title: whoa worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Man am i glad i did not get the 8 inch thick other mattress i was looking at. This one is thick! It seems comfortable and fits my futon frame good enough. There is a zipper on one end looking like the cover could come off if it had to be done but im just gonna keep a throw on it to keep it clean. If your futon sits short this will definately raise your seat level. Really its a nice matress for a futon.
customer_reviews.author: mr crazy guy

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever. BUY THE TAN VERSION.
customer_reviews.text: I move a lot and this has become my go to mattress. If you like a firm bed, it's super comfortable, and it's a cheap, convenient way to get a mattress at your new place. PRO TIP: Buy it in TAN I've now owned this in both the tan and the black and have found that some of the dye from the black (the chocolate color might have the same problem too) will transfer onto your sheets or mattress cover. It's not the end of the world, but it's nice if you can avoid this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mattress - very comfortable but it’s a pain to try to make it into a bed and back to a couch
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Henry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and comfort of this futon mattress! I'm using it for a guest bed and it fits the full frame perfectly. It's always a gamble ordering something so large online (it would be very difficult to return), but this was absolutely successful. I've had some futons in the past, but they weren't nearly as nice as this one. The springs really help with comfort. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Equipping My Bachelor Pad
customer_reviews.text: Laying on it right now. Comfortable, good looking, and inexpensive. Put it on a platform frame bed I also bought here on Amazon, just to get me through the buying of furniture for my new living arrangements. Frankly, while I personally did a poor job sizing it, it is comfortable enough that I made it my primary bed and don't plan on replacing it for the time being. If you a bacheloring it and need a budget bed and mattress, and don't want to use an inflatable (did that for a few months and my back is still sore), this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Mayers

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but the buttons gave out after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Had to sleep on it for months on end on a futon and it killed my back. partially futons fault but not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a bed and a couch. I can’t feel the metal bars of the frame beneath me which is a huge plus. I do have to have my kids help my lift it into a couch position though. That’s not a big deal, I figure either my frame is old, I have the mattress upside down, or it’s still too new to just easily fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Went cheap and bought this with the Full Size BiFold Sofabed and it was worth it. Comfortable after 6 months still in excellent shape. Some say if you don't rotate it that it becomes funky, not a problem here. I did finally rotate it but without doing so for 6 months I did not notice a problem at all. I would recommend it if you need a lower price. Didn't notice any funny smells or anything from it.
customer_reviews.author: bicyclepunk

customer_reviews.title: Ok For Temporary Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a futon frame I already had. The mattress is a little thick but not as confortable as the thickness would imply. Very “springy” and makes it difficult to open and close the futon frame, which was previously easy to open and close with the original foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nabeel

customer_reviews.title: Heck Yes! Def feel we got our Money's worth!
customer_reviews.text: Sleeps Comfortable!!! Great Price! Great Product!! I bought the 8" for one futon and ended up buying the 6" for another one! Really Impressed with Quality. Love the No-Slip backing too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarawhispers

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: What a great quality mattress for the money! It's much more comfortable for sitting than a reg futon mattress and it looks much nicer too as it doesn't get that "squished" look. We just got it so don't know how long it will last... but for $100 we can afford to switch it out in a few years if it loses it's cushyness.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Copening

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: This did the job for a while for my college student nephew, but it was really uncomfortable, and the depth of the seating was too short or narrow. Very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Elif K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Futon
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely good futon, have had it for over a year and a half. Used it almost everyday. However, the sections where is pulls back the fabric does fall into the hole overtime and with use. Avoid all DHP Frames, as the frame is a horrible match for this really good futon. Would buy again, if it ever comes down to it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It's still good, but gets annoying when trying to fold it ...
customer_reviews.text: As with my previous futon, they start out fluffy then deteriorates over time. However this one has springs in it, so the deterioration is to a lesser extent. Btw the other one is practically flat right now, but my brother is using it for the top bunk of my futon frame. It's still good, but gets annoying when trying to fold it with the futon frame into a couch due to the springs, so I usually leave it as a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description is incorrect....No Couch
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a COUCH!!! I bought one fully complete from walmart.com for $109.00. This is NOT A COUCH. Just mattress
customer_reviews.author: Ora Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i have to say is that im a little disappointed because it did not include the frame . I should have looked more closely at the title of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Plaugher

customer_reviews.title: Rates a 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for our ancient futon mattress. it is very comfortable and our guests thought it was very nice (which is what was really important!). We have not tried to fold the futon into a couch - might be a bit difficult because it is made so well for sleeping. We did not notice any strange smells. It did "off-gas" for a few hours but it was not terrible at all. More than a good deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: TetonCPA

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. It is a padded, spring mattress which is what I wanted. I am using it on the floor against the wall and it works well. It is very supportive of a 250lb man and can comfortably sit three at a time. It is about the same size as a full sized bed. The smell when you first get it is negligible. It's assumed that factory new items smell like the place they were made. But if you're concerned, it goes away withing a couple days. I would definitely recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Firm and comfortable, this mattress there is just something indescribable about ...
customer_reviews.text: Firm and comfortable, this mattress there is just something indescribable about it where it provides excellent support with just the right amount of give providing a great night's rest every time. The product has not flattened or bent in any way it arrived rolled up tightly,very heavy would recommend two people lifting. I really enjoy this mattress overall so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Guests are comfortable on this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I purchased this to use in my spare room for guests. It's very comfortable and fits the frame I purchased quite well. Remember, it's compressed when it arrives at your door and will take a little while to expand. Guests have remarked about its comfort, so I guess it's a good purchase. I have not tried it yet, but probably should/will soon.
customer_reviews.author: JeannieB

customer_reviews.title: I would have paid extra for this mattress when frame ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have paid extra for this mattress when frame was bought. This is an ideal futon mattress with coils which aren't felt when sitting or laying on, does not slip on frame whatsoever, heavier than original and makes fold to sitting position effortless. I got the 6" and I'm sure the 8" would perform just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this futon mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this futon mattress. Our futon stays open like a bed and is constantly used. This mattress is great, hasnt seemed to show any wear or dipping in any places. It came rolled up in a duffel bag and was easy to take out. It did have a slight smell but nothing bad, just a new smell. The smell was gone the next day. It folds easy right away. Great price for a nice spring futon mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Ordered this to replace an old mattress that I had for 10 years. It was delivered to my house, took it out of the plastic and let it sit for the required hours before putting it on the frame. Nice and comfortable. I haven't slept on it yet, but just to take catnaps. So far, so good. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Futon mattress
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new one and this one works. Plus, couldn't find one in a store.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rebich

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job at a good price (but spring-y)
customer_reviews.text: We have a twin mattress from signature sleep and I'd say it's much more comfortable (you can't feel springs in it - but you can in this). That would be my worst complaint - that you can definitely feel the springs - but as a futon on the bottom of a bunk bed in my 6 y/o room it's not too bad - especially given that my 6 y/o chooses to now sleep on it every night over the top twin bunk he had been in (but that's probably the newness of it more than anything).
customer_reviews.author: A. Kluver

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when promised, was packaged well, fit our futon frame nicely even though it was slightly larger than our old mattress. It seemed a little hard to me but I like soft beds. Our son and daughter-in-law who were the first to sleep on it said it was comfortable. I was worried about odors since our son was coming the day after it arrived but there was no odor at all. I let it air out overnight before I made the bed for him. But honestly the odor never seemed bad to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress arrived quickly and was easy to put in place. In fact, it is probably more comfortable than our actual bed. The only reason I did not give it a full 5 stars is that is somewhat difficult to clean. This futon serves as the couch in our living room, so we've had to cover it with a pretty sheet that can be removed and washed otherwise any dropped food is impossible to get out entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Willis

customer_reviews.title: very firm, springy
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace a dying futon mattress. - very firm and springy, you can slightly feel the springs even - comfortable to sleep on (I prefer firm though) - folds nicely on my futon - seems durable (had for 1+ year now and going strong) I wrap mine with a waterproof cover and then a futon mattress cover again. this makes it impervious to most accidents (and believe me my futon has seen a fair share of these). would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: penlight

customer_reviews.title: Goodbuy
customer_reviews.text: Was a great buy. My futon is more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent mattress
customer_reviews.text: 6 inches sure doesn't look like much but it has the support in the coils which I'm hoping it lasts longer than just foam. Its harder to fold due to the coils, took 2 of us. 1 to fold & 1 to press in center to fold but thats understandable. Pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: janet henninger

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use
customer_reviews.text: It's a bargain futon mattress so I didn't expect much, but after just a month of use I can already feel the springs when my futon is in sofa position. Also, instead tuffeting the mattress with buttons or thread they used these plastic things that are large versions of the plastic things used to attach tags to clothing. Those have caught on the cover and pricked it in several places and they keep sticking me. I will be buying a foam mattress pad to help with both of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Monica E. Lea

customer_reviews.title: great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing it came in only a couple of days which was great. Then when we got it I was so pleased it looks soft in the picture and I was so happy that it was since it is going to be used primarily as a couch. Also I was hoping it was a good mattress since like I said it was going to be folded in to couch position more often than bed these futon mattresses tend to get pretty crappy but this one has an inner spring that keeps it nice and plush. I am so happy with this I will be getting one of these for my other children's beds also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected something more like what came with the futon originally
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly impressed by this. I expected something more like what came with the futon originally. This is much better. For a futon, it's a pretty good mattress. Sort of firm. Returns to normal shape when you sit up (no butt dents left behind). The packaging doesn't represent what's inside when dropped at your doorstep. Looked like it was more likely a rug than a mattress. It was rolled VERY tightly and vacuum sealed. As soon as you poke a little hole in the plastic it begins to return to shape. It happens quickly. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Need an entire fouton and found some on line that will deliver to my house. Sorry and thank you
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I thought it was it was just a matress so I refused it ups has already taken it when they delivered another package to me today but did tell me next time I want to return something I should go to CVS for a return lable.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Moore

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This was false advertising in my opinion... There was a picture of a mattress and a frame and only the mattress came...If That's not false advertisement I don't know what is...and I am very disappointed in amazon right now.. and I will post on media
customer_reviews.author: Eli M

customer_reviews.title: Value = good product
customer_reviews.text: For the value this is a very good product. Based on the price range and quality of the material you should not be disappointed. There were previous comments from others talking about a smell when opened, but I did not find this with the mattress I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Having springs, I was unsure whether or not it'd work as a futon mattress. You don't notice them much at all! They're quite sturdy springs and there's enough cushioning in the 6-inches that you can feel their support, but not the springs themselves. It's all ample to sleep on and it fit my futon frame perfectly! Granted, my frame is from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for a budget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress as a gift for my adult son in July. He is on a tight budget and when his air mattress sprung a leak, he had limited options. I ordered this as part of his birthday gift this year. I was pleased with the purchase. The price was very reasonable. The mattress arrived early. My son told me that set up was a breeze and the mattress is very comfortable. Full size sheets fit it nicely and you wouldn't be able to tell it is a futon mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: It is not the most comfortable futon mattress have ever slept on but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple of months now. It is not the most comfortable futon mattress have ever slept on but it is still much better than others and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

product_meta.title: DHP 6-inch Coil Futon Full Size Mattress (only), Tan
product_meta.description: Color:TanExperience the ultimate in mattress style with DHP's 6 inch Coil Futon Mattress! This classic piece offers the best of functionality and comfort with its versatile design. Whether you are sitting with friends or taking a nap, this futon mattress is a top choice. It is made with a spring coil base that offers consistent support and proper balance and topped with high-density foam, which provides exceptionally comfortable surface. Available in multiple colors, it comes in microfiber or linen upholstery to match your favorite futon frame, style and décor!
feature_bullets: Foam and polyester layering between cover and coils offer optimal comfort and support. 6" coil futon mattress with a lavish tufted microfiber cover
Fits any standard full-sized futon frame
Product dimensions: 75"L x 54"W x 6"H. Net weight: 50 lbs. Weight limit- 450 pounds

Foam in this mattress is made without PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP (“Tris”) flame retardants, ozone depleters, mercury, lead and heavy metals. Foam is low in VOC emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 PPM). Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Safety Product Commission.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,201 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
